alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 7:21PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Douglas County through 745 PM PDT... At 719 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Roseburg, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Roseburg North around 730 PM PDT. Roseburg and Winchester around 740 PM PDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Green. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
